task.title: Ground the Circuit
task.shortdesc: Soldering the ground wires to the pots and output jack.

step.cmd: Use one of the following methods to Lug 1 of the volume pot.

choices.choice: Solder the fully-stripped 0.5 inch solid core wire from Lug 1 of the volume pot straight back to the volume pot casing.
Bend back Lug 1 and and solder it directly to the casing.

image.alt: Wiring diagram showing the ground connection from Lug 1 of the volume pot to the casing

step.cmd: Solder a wire between the volume and tone pot casings.
step.info: Use the black wire you cut earlier from the volume pot casing.

image.alt: Wiring Diagram showing the ground connection between the volume and tone pots

step.cmd: Solder the final black wire from the casing of the volume pot to the Sleeve of the output jack.
step.info: The Sleeve of the output jack is the larger inner-most lug.

image.alt: Wiring Diagram showing the ground connection between the volume pot casing to the output jack
